name: happy-hour-unpleasant-in-mount-pleasant
title: Happy Hour: Unpleasant In Mount Pleasant
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• A Mount Pleasant sewage pipe broke and spewed 1.4 million pounds gallons of raw sewage across a road, which took almost 8 hours to clean up. Just… ew. [Tennessean]
  • Nashville taxi drivers aren’t happy about limousine and sedan services taking away their business. Metro has finally responded by drafting an ordinance to regulate the services, but the Metro Nashville Taxi Drivers Association is still skeptical. Maybe they’ll go on strike and our streets will be a few cars lighter. [City Paper]
  • CarMax made a $15,000 donation to the Vanderbilt Children’s Hospital that will provide bedside computers for the kids to keep in touch with their families while they’re all holed up in the hospital. [Tennessean]
  • Since the value of the dollar is dropping like it’s hot, Tennessee tourism officials say that Europeans will be flocking to Nashville because they love them some country music. Who knew? [WSMV]
